::Koj::

Koj looks at Oblitertron "Maybe not but I can try." As he braces himself for 
the blast.

::Inu-Yasha::

Inu-Yasha slides infornt of Koj taking the blast and getting his damaging 
his side.

::Koj::

Koj looks at Inu-Yasha's cracked sided "I told you to get them out of here. 
Thanks Inu the Fangs a enegry Eating weapon if I can stab him with it I may 
weaken him."


::Inu-Yasha::

Inu-Yasha lets Koj climb on takes to the heavens opens his Mouth and Fires a 
massive Ice beam at Oblitertron's thrusters. As he gets Koj close enough.

::Koj::

Koj ties a chain to Fang and tries to stick in Oblitertron so it can drink 
his enegry.
